title: Is anyone else upset that crimson akali is gone?
body: Image source SQUPO yt channel ------- I went to look at the new akali update and saw that i now had infernal akali? It might seem kinda lame because crimson is pretty much a chroma but I liked it for its simplicity yet red flair.  I just want my crimson akali skin, it was the first one I ever bought. :(
